title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 576.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 576.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to residential treatment facilities for children and youth
licensed pursuant to article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law and issued operating
certificates in accordance with Part 584 of this Title. (b) These regulations apply to payments made
by government agencies pursuant to title 11 of article 5 of the Social Services

Law for services provided by a residential treatment facility for children and
youth licensed by the Office of Mental Health in accordance with the provisions
of Part 584 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
576.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
